message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. It's a one-of-a-kind item that I think you'll really love. I'm thinking of selling it to you for $12000. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the uniqueness of the item. However, given my budget constraints, I am only able to offer $10000 for the product.

Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $11000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make sure I'm getting a fair price for this unique item. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I understand the value of the product, but I'm still constrained by my budget. I would like to propose an offer of $10500 for the product.

I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $11000, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I'm starting to think that you're a serious buyer, and I'd like to see if we can come to a mutually beneficial agreement. What do you think?
Thank you for considering my previous offers, Alice. I'm still interested in purchasing the product, but I'm unable to go above $10750. I hope this meets somewhere in between our prices.

I can see you're really interested in the product, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $11200, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I think this is a fair price considering the product's value and uniqueness. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I respect the value of the product and appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I am willing to pay $11000 for the product.

I think we're getting close, Bob! I'm willing to meet you at $11250, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. I believe this is a fair price for the product, considering its value and uniqueness. What do you think?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I've been considering the value of the product carefully, and I believe $11000 is a fair price. I hope this meets our mutual expectations.
